get.description: Returns menu structure for default menu with specified num levels.

get.summary:
Returns menu structure for specified or default menu with specified or all 
                     levels.
get.description:
Returns menu structure for specified or default menu with specified or all 
                     levels.

get.summary:
Returns menu item with all products in that item plus sub menus used 
                     for filtering. Use delivery date and "product" expand options to retrieve
                     product information without needing a second api call. You can also expand on
                     "assets" to
get.description:
Returns menu item with all products in that item plus sub menus used 
                     for filtering. Use delivery date and "product" expand options to retrieve
                     product information without needing a second api call. You can also expand on
                     "assets" to get icons and stickers for all products.

get.summary: Returns offer information for an offer id.
get.description:
Sample Request:

    GET /offer/{offerId:int}
    
Expand behaviour:

    Include the Expand Operator in the query string to add additional fields to the Offer object returned.
    
    Example:
    
    GET /offer/{offerId:int}?expand=offercategories
    
    Offer object returned will be populated with arrays of categories which saves a second request being made to the other endpoints.

404.description: No offer with this id was found

get.summary: Returns offers for date for specified
get.description:
# Sample Request
GET /offers

404.description: No offers for this date were found

get.summary: Returns offer category information for specified offerId
get.description:
# Sample Request
GET /offer/1412/categories

# Expand Behaviour
Use expand option "offerproduct" to return OfferCategoryProducts.

404.description: No OfferCategories with this OfferId were found

get.summary:
Returns product information for first possible date for specified
                     comma separated list of product ids.
get.description:
# Sample Request
GET /offer/983/category/1013

# Expand Behaviour
Use expand option "offerproduct" to return OfferCategoryProducts.

Expand is not supported on detailed product information for performance reasons.

404.description: No OfferCategory with this id was found

get.description:
# Sample Request
GET /offer/983/category/1013/products

# Expand Behaviour
Use expand option "products" to return Products.

404.description: No OfferCategoryProducts with the OfferCateogoryId was found

get.summary: Returns product information for first possible date.
get.description:
Sample Request:

    GET /product/{productId:int}
    
Expand behaviour:

    Include the Expand Operator in the query string to add additional fields to the Product object returned.
    
    Example:
    
    GET /product/{productId:int}?expand=dates,frequencies 
    
    Product object returned will be populated with arrays of dates and frequencies which saves a second request being made to the other endpoints.

400.description: Request not valid or item id not specified

401.description: Forbidden, you are not authorised to access this endpoint

404.description: Product with this Id was not found

get.description: Returns dates for specified product.
Returns descriptions for specified product.
Returns Valid frequencies for product.
Returns Assets for product.

200.description: Returns the media for the requested product

400.description: Request not valid or item id not specified

401.description: Forbidden, you are not authorised to access this endpoint

404.description: No product with these ids were found

get.description: Returns all frequencies.

post.summary:
Returns product information for first possible date for specified
                     comma separated list of product ids provided in the body of the GET.
post.description:
# Sample Request
GET /products

BODY (NOTE: We know this is a REST no-no, however our path restriction makes it necessary)

    {
        "Ids": [646,416,76,1483,446,230,210,447,599,1082,3515,871]
    }
# Expand Behaviour
Use expand option "filters" to return filters (Featured/Lifestyle/Producer) for products.

Use expand option "assets" to return assets (Icons/Stickers etc) for products.

Expand is not supported on detailed product information for performance reasons.

400.description: Request not valid or item id not specified

401.description: Forbidden, you are not authorised to access this endpoint

404.description: No products with these ids were found

get.summary:
Returns product information for first possible date for specified
                     comma separated list of product ids.
get.description:
# Sample Request
GET /products?productIds=76,6524,420,230

# Expand Behaviour
Use expand option "filters" to return filters (Featured/Lifestyle/Producer) for products.

Use expand option "assets" to return assets (Icons/Stickers etc) for products.

Expand is not supported on detailed product information for performance reasons.

400.description: Request not valid or item id not specified

401.description: Forbidden, you are not authorised to access this endpoint

404.description: No products with these ids were found

get.summary: Search for the index of a url
get.description:
This will search against Products and then against MenuItems should no product be found. If no menuId is provided
then a configured default will be used

Sample Requests:

    GET /index?url=geranium-grapefruit-cleansing-hand-wash-bio-d-5l
    
    GET /index?url=household
    
    GET /index?url=household&menuId=45
    
    GET /index?url=household/flowers-plants&menuId=45
    
    GET /index?url=household/flowers-plants/seeds&menuId=45
    
    GET /index?url=household/flowers-plants/seeds_plants&menuId=45

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: Friendly Url to be used as search term

parameters.name: menuId
parameters.description: Format - int32. Optional menuId to search in should the search be for a Menu Item

400.description: Request not valid, refer to message for information

get.description: Returns menu structure for home page carousel.
Returns menu structure for home page new
Returns menu structure for home page inspiration
Returns menu structure for home page default

AssetType.description:
The type of asset associated with product.

Possible values:

  • 1 - ProductIcon:
  • 1314 - BoxRecipeIcon:
  • 1322 - ProductBanner:
  • 1707 - ProductSticker:

EntityType.description:
Type of entity

Possible values:

  • 0 - NONE: Entity is not known
  • 1 - PRODUCT: Entity is a Product
  • 2 - MENU_ITEM: Entity is a MenuItem

Id.description: Id of the frequency which is NoOfWeeks of the frequency.

Description.description: Description of the frequency (e.g. One Delivery Only).

EntityId.description: Id of the entity, can be a ProductId or MenuItemId

Filters.description:
Optional filters applied to the original query. Only returned
when result contains no SubMenuItems

IndexResult.description: Model to describe the index of a search

MediaType.description:
Enumerable for EntityMedia Type. Equivalent to lut.EntityMediaType in main database.

Possible values:

  • 1 - Image:
  • 2 - Video:

MenuTypeName.description: The name of the type of the menu.

MenuItems.description: List of sub menu items for this item

FilterMenus.description: List of filter menus associated with the collection of products.

MenuItemId.description: The id of this menu item

MenuItemName.description: The name of this menu item

MenuItemDesc.description: The description of this menu item

ParentMenuItemId.description: The parent of this menu item

ProductCount.description: The number of active products associated with a menu item.

ShowOffers.description: True if the menu item relates to offers.

ContentOnly.description:
True if the menu item is content only and should be jumped to as a 
                     page rather than displayed as a collection of products.

ContentUrl.description:
Contains the URL of any content to be displayed on category page 
                     (if supported) or the URL of the page to jump to if ContentOnly.

Content.description:
Object which represents optional content which could be serviced 
                     from a third party CMS.

ImageUrl.description: Contains the URL of any image to be displayed on category page.

CategoryContent.description: Contains any content data for a special category content display.

FriendlyUrl.description: Contains the friendly URL of the menu item.

FriendlyUrlPath.description: Contains the friendly URL path of the menu item which includes parent path.

IsVisibleInMainMenu.description: Returns true if menu item should be visible on top level menu.

Level.description: The level at which the menu item appears in the queried heirarchy.

SubMenuItems.description: List of sub menu items for this item

Breadcrumbs.description: List of breadcrumbs for this item

Products.description: List of products for this item

Filters.description: List of filter menus associated with a selected menu item

CanonicalURL.description:
Tells search engines this page should be normally be accessed via 
                     an alternative URL

PageTitle.description: Page title for the browser header

ProductId.description: The id of the product associated with the menu item.

SortIndex.description: The legacy Sort Index for the products posisition in the menu heirarchy.

SalesIndex.description:
The Sales Index in a sort order for the products posisition in the menu 
           heirarchy based on current sales quantity and value plus new/offer status.

MenuType.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - Archived:
  • 2 - MainMenu:
  • 3 - MainFilter:
  • 4 - AutoFilter:
  • 6 - SecondaryFilter:

ContentURL.description: The URL for any content or imagery associated with the offer.

FriendlyURL.description: The friendly URL for the offer.

StickerURL.description: The URL for the sticker image shown on products for example.

ValidFrom.description: The date the offer is valid from

ValidTo.description: The date the offer is valid to

OfferCategories.description: A list of associated offer categories

QualificationTypeName.description: The name of the type of qualification.

OfferProducts.description: A list of products in the category

ProductTypeName.description: The name of the type of product.

DeliveryDate.description: The date on which the product will be delivered.

ProductBrand.description: Brand or supplier of the product.

ProductSize.description: Size or weight information of the product.

Available.description: Whether the product is available for specific date.

Remaining.description: What quantity are remaining for sale.

PricePerUnit.description: The price per unit of the product.

OfferPrice.description: The offer price of this product (if any).

OfferComment.description: Comment about any offers appropriate for this product e.g. 10% off.

OfferId.description: Offer Id if the comment relates to an offer so is linkable.

ProductURL.description: The friendly URL of this product.

ImageName.description: The filname for the main image for the product.

PortraitImageName.description: The filname for the portrait image for the product if populated.

BoxRecipeId.description: The box recipe ID for this product (if applicable).

WebComment.description: Comments from the website regarding this product.

AverageWeight.description: The average weight of this product when catchweight.

DefaultFrequencyId.description: Default frequency of product in number of weeks.

FrequencyRestrictionName.description: Any restrictions on the frequency for this product.

DayNumber.description: The day number for the date selected.

AvailabilityMessage.description: If there is any issue with availability, a message is returned.

NoOrder.description: Set to true if there is no future delivery date for this product.

Rating.description: The percentage rating of the product.

Reviews.description: The number of reviews on the product.

NextAvailableDate.description: The next date that the product will be available.

PreOrder.description: True if item is out of season and next order classed as PreOrder.

InfoTypeId.description: The type of info panel to be shown on product cards (if any).

InfoText.description: The static info text to be shown on product cards (if any).

Descriptions.description: List of frequencies available for this product.

Dates.description: Information regarding this product relative to its delivery date.

Media.description: List of any related media for this product.

Assets.description: List of shared assets associated with this product.

Frequencies.description: List of frequencies available for this product.

ProductIds.description: Ids for the collection of products as a string used for linking.

Products.description: List of products returned as part of collection.

Filters.description: List of filter menus associated with the collection of products.

Available.description: True if product is available for sale on date

Remaining.description: Quantity of limited product remaining for sale

OfferComment.description: comment about any offers appropriate for this product - e.g. 10% off

BoxRecipeId.description: Box recipe ID of the product if applicable

ProductName.description: Optional Overriden name for date e.g. for Recipe Products

ImageName.description: Optional Overriden image for date e.g. for Recipe Products

DayNumber.description: The day number of the delivery date

ProductId.description: Product Id - not necessarily required when part of product

TypeId.description: The Type Id of the product description

TypeName.description: The name of the product description

Description.description: The Description of the product description

SortIndex.description: The sort order of the description

EntityMediaId.description: The Id for record for use by Entity Framework.

SortOrder.description: The order the Media has been sorted into

URI.description: An identifier to uniquely retrieve this media type

MediaTypeName.description: Whether the type of media is an image / video as string.

ProductType.description:
Possible values:

  • 1 - Standard:
  • 2 - FixedBox:
  • 3 - ModifiableBox:
  • 4 - RecipeKit:
  • 5 - RecipeProduct:
  • 6 - MeatBox:
